title: Booker T Washington National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Open daily, year-round, 9 am to 5 pm. Closed Thanksgiving Day, December 25, and January 1.  Park can be closed at times due to inclement weather. Please contact the park at (540) 721-2094 if there is inclement weather to find out hours of operation.
